column1: Ephesians:
"Ephesians"|"49"|"1"|"001"|"Paul
column2: an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God
column3: to the saints which are at Ephesus
column4: and to the faithful in Christ Jesus:"

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"1"|"002"|"Grace be to you
column2: and peace
column3: from God our Father
column4: and from the Lord Jesus Christ."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"1"|"003"|"Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ
column2: who hath blessed us with all spiritual blessings in heavenly places in Christ:"

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"1"|"004"|"According as he hath chosen us in him before the foundation of the world
column2: that we should be holy and without blame before him in love:"

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"1"|"005"|"Having predestinated us unto the adoption of children by Jesus Christ to himself
column2: according to the good pleasure of his will
column3: Ephesians"|"49"|"1"|"006"|"To the praise of the glory of his grace
column4: wherein he hath made us accepted in the beloved."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"1"|"007"|"In whom we have redemption through his blood
column2: the forgiveness of sins
column3: according to the riches of his grace
column4: Ephesians"|"49"|"1"|"008"|"Wherein he hath abounded toward us in all wisdom and prudence
column5: Ephesians"|"49"|"1"|"009"|"Having made known unto us the mystery of his will
column6: according to his good pleasure which he hath purposed in himself:"

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"1"|"010"|"That in the dispensation of the fulness of times he might gather together in one all things in Christ
column2: both which are in heaven
column3: and which are on earth
column4: even in him:"

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"1"|"011"|"In whom also we have obtained an inheritance
column2: being predestinated according to the purpose of him who worketh all things after the counsel of his own will:"

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"1"|"012"|"That we should be to the praise of his glory
column2: who first trusted in Christ."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"1"|"013"|"In whom ye also trusted
column2: after that ye heard the word of truth
column3: the gospel of your salvation: in whom also after that ye believed
column4: ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise
column5: Ephesians"|"49"|"1"|"014"|"Which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession
column6: unto the praise of his glory."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"1"|"015"|"Wherefore I also
column2: after I heard of your faith in the Lord Jesus
column3: and love unto all the saints
column4: Ephesians"|"49"|"1"|"016"|"Cease not to give thanks for you
column5: making mention of you in my prayers
column6: Ephesians"|"49"|"1"|"017"|"That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ
column8: may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him:"

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"1"|"018"|"The eyes of your understanding being enlightened
column2: that ye may know what is the hope of his calling
column3: and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints
column4: Ephesians"|"49"|"1"|"019"|"And what is the exceeding greatness of his power to us-ward who believe
column5: according to the working of his mighty power
column6: Ephesians"|"49"|"1"|"020"|"Which he wrought in Christ
column7: when he raised him from the dead
column8: and set him at his own right hand in the heavenly places
column13: and every name that is named
column15: but also in that which is to come:"

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"1"|"022"|"And hath put all things under his feet
column2: and gave him to be the head over all things to the church
column3: Ephesians"|"49"|"1"|"023"|"Which is his body
column4: the fulness of him that filleth all in all."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"2"|"001"|"And you hath he quickened
column2: who were dead in trespasses and sins
column3: Ephesians"|"49"|"2"|"002"|"Wherein in time past ye walked according to the course of this world
column4: according to the prince of the power of the air
column5: the spirit that now worketh in the children of disobedience:"

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"2"|"003"|"Among whom also we all had our conversation in times past in the lusts of our flesh
column2: fulfilling the desires of the flesh and of the mind
column3: and were by nature the children of wrath
column4: even as others."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"2"|"004"|"But God
column2: who is rich in mercy
column3: for his great love wherewith he loved us
column4: Ephesians"|"49"|"2"|"005"|"Even when we were dead in sins
column5: hath quickened us together with Christ
column6: (by grace ye are saved

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"2"|"006"|"And hath raised us up together
column2: and made us sit together in heavenly places in Christ Jesus:"

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"2"|"007"|"That in the ages to come he might shew the exceeding riches of his grace in his kindness toward us through Christ Jesus."
"Ephesians"|"49"|"2"|"008"|"For by grace are ye saved through faith
column2: and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God:"

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"2"|"009"|"Not of works
column2: lest any man should boast."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"2"|"010"|"For we are his workmanship
column2: created in Christ Jesus unto good works
column3: which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"2"|"011"|"Wherefore remember
column2: that ye being in time past Gentiles in the flesh
column3: who are called Uncircumcision by that which is called the Circumcision in the flesh made by hands
column4: Ephesians"|"49"|"2"|"012"|"That at that time ye were without Christ
column5: being aliens from the commonwealth of Israel
column6: and strangers from the covenants of promise
column8: and without God in the world:"

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"2"|"013"|"But now in Christ Jesus ye who sometimes were far off are made nigh by the blood of Christ."
"Ephesians"|"49"|"2"|"014"|"For he is our peace
column2: who hath made both one
column3: and hath broken down the middle wall of partition between us
column4: Ephesians"|"49"|"2"|"015"|"Having abolished in his flesh the enmity
column5: even the law of commandments contained in ordinances
column6: for to make in himself of twain one new man
column8: Ephesians"|"49"|"2"|"016"|"And that he might reconcile both unto God in one body by the cross

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"2"|"017"|"And came and preached peace to you which were afar off
column2: and to them that were nigh."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"2"|"018"|"For through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the Father."
"Ephesians"|"49"|"2"|"019"|"Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners
column2: but fellowcitizens with the saints
column3: and of the household of God
column4: Ephesians"|"49"|"2"|"020"|"And are built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets
column5: Jesus Christ himself being the chief corner stone
column6: Ephesians"|"49"|"2"|"021"|"In whom all the building fitly framed together groweth unto an holy temple in the Lord:"

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"2"|"022"|"In whom ye also are builded together for an habitation of God through the Spirit."
"Ephesians"|"49"|"3"|"001"|"For this cause I Paul
column2: the prisoner of Jesus Christ for you Gentiles
column3: Ephesians"|"49"|"3"|"002"|"If ye have heard of the dispensation of the grace of God which is given me to you-ward:"

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"3"|"003"|"How that by revelation he made known unto me the mystery
column2: (as I wrote afore in few words
column3: Ephesians"|"49"|"3"|"004"|"Whereby
column4: when ye read
column5: ye may understand my knowledge in the mystery of Christ)"

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"3"|"005"|"Which in other ages was not made known unto the sons of men
column2: as it is now revealed unto his holy apostles and prophets by the Spirit
column3: Ephesians"|"49"|"3"|"006"|"That the Gentiles should be fellowheirs
column4: and of the same body
column5: and partakers of his promise in Christ by the gospel:"

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"3"|"007"|"Whereof I was made a minister
column2: according to the gift of the grace of God given unto me by the effectual working of his power."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"3"|"008"|"Unto me
column2: who am less than the least of all saints
column3: is this grace given
column4: that I should preach among the Gentiles the unsearchable riches of Christ
column5: Ephesians"|"49"|"3"|"009"|"And to make all men see what is the fellowship of the mystery
column6: which from the beginning of the world hath been hid in God
column7: who created all things by Jesus Christ:"

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"3"|"010"|"To the intent that now unto the principalities and powers in heavenly places might be known by the church the manifold wisdom of God
column2: Ephesians"|"49"|"3"|"011"|"According to the eternal purpose which he purposed in Christ Jesus our Lord:"

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"3"|"012"|"In whom we have boldness and access with confidence by the faith of him."
"Ephesians"|"49"|"3"|"013"|"Wherefore I desire that ye faint not at my tribulations for you
column2: which is your glory."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"3"|"014"|"For this cause I bow my knees unto the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ
column2: Ephesians"|"49"|"3"|"015"|"Of whom the whole family in heaven and earth is named
column3: Ephesians"|"49"|"3"|"016"|"That he would grant you
column4: according to the riches of his glory
column5: to be strengthened with might by his Spirit in the inner man
column6: Ephesians"|"49"|"3"|"017"|"That Christ may dwell in your hearts by faith
column8: being rooted and grounded in love
column9: Ephesians"|"49"|"3"|"018"|"May be able to comprehend with all saints what is the breadth
column13: Ephesians"|"49"|"3"|"019"|"And to know the love of Christ
column15: that ye might be filled with all the fulness of God."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"3"|"020"|"Now unto him that is able to do exceeding abundantly above all that we ask or think
column2: according to the power that worketh in us
column3: Ephesians"|"49"|"3"|"021"|"Unto him be glory in the church by Christ Jesus throughout all ages
column4: world without end. Amen."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"4"|"001"|"I therefore
column2: the prisoner of the Lord
column3: beseech you that ye walk worthy of the vocation wherewith ye are called
column4: Ephesians"|"49"|"4"|"002"|"With all lowliness and meekness
column5: with longsuffering
column6: forbearing one another in love
column7: Ephesians"|"49"|"4"|"003"|"Endeavouring to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"4"|"004"|"There is one body
column2: and one Spirit
column3: even as ye are called in one hope of your calling
column4: Ephesians"|"49"|"4"|"005"|"One Lord
column5: one faith
column6: one baptism
column7: Ephesians"|"49"|"4"|"006"|"One God and Father of all

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"4"|"007"|"But unto every one of us is given grace according to the measure of the gift of Christ."
"Ephesians"|"49"|"4"|"008"|"Wherefore he saith
column2: When he ascended up on high
column3: he led captivity captive
column4: and gave gifts unto men."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"4"|"009"|"(Now that he ascended
column2: what is it but that he also descended first into the lower parts of the earth?"

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"4"|"010"|"He that descended is the same also that ascended up far above all heavens
column2: that he might fill all things.)"

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"4"|"011"|"And he gave some
column2: apostles
column3: and some
column4: prophets
column5: and some
column6: evangelists
column9: Ephesians"|"49"|"4"|"012"|"For the perfecting of the saints
column10: for the work of the ministry
column11: for the edifying of the body of Christ:"

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"4"|"013"|"Till we all come in the unity of the faith
column2: and of the knowledge of the Son of God
column3: unto a perfect man
column4: unto the measure of the stature of the fulness of Christ:"

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"4"|"014"|"That we henceforth be no more children
column2: tossed to and fro
column3: and carried about with every wind of doctrine
column4: by the sleight of men
column5: and cunning craftiness
column6: whereby they lie in wait to deceive
column7: Ephesians"|"49"|"4"|"015"|"But speaking the truth in love
column8: may grow up into him in all things

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"4"|"016"|"From whom the whole body fitly joined together and compacted by that which every joint supplieth
column2: according to the effectual working in the measure of every part
column3: maketh increase of the body unto the edifying of itself in love."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"4"|"017"|"This I say therefore
column2: and testify in the Lord
column3: that ye henceforth walk not as other Gentiles walk
column4: in the vanity of their mind
column5: Ephesians"|"49"|"4"|"018"|"Having the understanding darkened
column6: being alienated from the life of God through the ignorance that is in them
column7: because of the blindness of their heart:"

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"4"|"019"|"Who being past feeling have given themselves over unto lasciviousness
column2: to work all uncleanness with greediness."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"4"|"020"|"But ye have not so learned Christ
column2: Ephesians"|"49"|"4"|"021"|"If so be that ye have heard him
column3: and have been taught by him
column4: as the truth is in Jesus:"

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"4"|"022"|"That ye put off concerning the former conversation the old man
column2: which is corrupt according to the deceitful lusts
column3: Ephesians"|"49"|"4"|"023"|"And be renewed in the spirit of your mind
column4: Ephesians"|"49"|"4"|"024"|"And that ye put on the new man
column5: which after God is created in righteousness and true holiness."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"4"|"025"|"Wherefore putting away lying
column2: speak every man truth with his neighbour: for we are members one of another."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"4"|"026"|"Be ye angry
column2: and sin not: let not the sun go down upon your wrath:"

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"4"|"027"|"Neither give place to the devil."
"Ephesians"|"49"|"4"|"028"|"Let him that stole steal no more: but rather let him labour
column2: working with his hands the thing which is good
column3: that he may have to give to him that needeth."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"4"|"029"|"Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth
column2: but that which is good to the use of edifying
column3: that it may minister grace unto the hearers."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"4"|"030"|"And grieve not the holy Spirit of God
column2: whereby ye are sealed unto the day of redemption."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"4"|"031"|"Let all bitterness
column2: and wrath
column3: and anger
column4: and clamour
column5: and evil speaking
column6: be put away from you

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"4"|"032"|"And be ye kind one to another
column2: tenderhearted
column3: forgiving one another
column4: even as God for Christ2019s sake hath forgiven you."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"001"|"Be ye therefore followers of God
column2: as dear children
column3: Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"002"|"And walk in love
column4: as Christ also hath loved us
column5: and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"003"|"But fornication
column2: and all uncleanness
column3: or covetousness
column4: let it not be once named among you
column5: as becometh saints
column6: Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"004"|"Neither filthiness
column9: which are not convenient: but rather giving of thanks."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"005"|"For this ye know
column2: that no whoremonger
column3: nor unclean person
column4: nor covetous man
column5: who is an idolater
column6: hath any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and of God."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"006"|"Let no man deceive you with vain words: for because of these things cometh the wrath of God upon the children of disobedience."
"Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"007"|"Be not ye therefore partakers with them."
"Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"008"|"For ye were sometimes darkness
column2: but now are ye light in the Lord: walk as children of light:"

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"009"|"(For the fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness and righteousness and truth
"Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"010"|"Proving what is acceptable unto the Lord."
"Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"011"|"And have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness
column2: but rather reprove them."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"012"|"For it is a shame even to speak of those things which are done of them in secret."
"Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"013"|"But all things that are reproved are made manifest by the light: for whatsoever doth make manifest is light."
"Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"014"|"Wherefore he saith
column2: Awake thou that sleepest
column3: and arise from the dead
column4: and Christ shall give thee light."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"015"|"See then that ye walk circumspectly
column2: not as fools
column3: but as wise
column4: Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"016"|"Redeeming the time
column5: because the days are evil."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"017"|"Wherefore be ye not unwise
column2: but understanding what the will of the Lord is."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"018"|"And be not drunk with wine
column2: wherein is excess
column3: but be filled with the Spirit
column4: Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"019"|"Speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs
column5: singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord
column6: Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"020"|"Giving thanks always for all things unto God and the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ
column7: Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"021"|"Submitting yourselves one to another in the fear of God."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"022"|"Wives
column2: submit yourselves unto your own husbands
column3: as unto the Lord."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"023"|"For the husband is the head of the wife
column2: even as Christ is the head of the church: and he is the saviour of the body."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"024"|"Therefore as the church is subject unto Christ
column2: so let the wives be to their own husbands in every thing."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"025"|"Husbands
column2: love your wives
column3: even as Christ also loved the church
column4: and gave himself for it
column5: Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"026"|"That he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word
column6: Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"027"|"That he might present it to himself a glorious church
column10: but that it should be holy and without blemish."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"028"|"So ought men to love their wives as their own bodies. He that loveth his wife loveth himself."
"Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"029"|"For no man ever yet hated his own flesh
column2: but nourisheth and cherisheth it
column3: even as the Lord the church:"

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"030"|"For we are members of his body
column2: of his flesh
column3: and of his bones."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"031"|"For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother
column2: and shall be joined unto his wife
column3: and they two shall be one flesh."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"032"|"This is a great mystery: but I speak concerning Christ and the church."
"Ephesians"|"49"|"5"|"033"|"Nevertheless let every one of you in particular so love his wife even as himself
column2: and the wife see that she reverence her husband."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"6"|"001"|"Children
column2: obey your parents in the Lord: for this is right."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"6"|"002"|"Honour thy father and mother
column2: which is the first commandment with promise
column3: Ephesians"|"49"|"6"|"003"|"That it may be well with thee
column4: and thou mayest live long on the earth."

column2: ye fathers
column3: provoke not your children to wrath: but bring them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"6"|"005"|"Servants
column2: be obedient to them that are your masters according to the flesh
column3: with fear and trembling
column4: in singleness of your heart
column5: as unto Christ
column6: Ephesians"|"49"|"6"|"006"|"Not with eyeservice
column8: but as the servants of Christ
column9: doing the will of God from the heart

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"6"|"008"|"Knowing that whatsoever good thing any man doeth
column2: the same shall he receive of the Lord
column3: whether he be bond or free."

column2: ye masters
column3: do the same things unto them
column4: forbearing threatening: knowing that your Master also is in heaven
column5: neither is there respect of persons with him."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"6"|"010"|"Finally
column2: my brethren
column3: be strong in the Lord
column4: and in the power of his might."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"6"|"011"|"Put on the whole armour of God
column2: that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"6"|"012"|"For we wrestle not against flesh and blood
column2: but against principalities
column3: against powers
column4: against the rulers of the darkness of this world
column5: against spiritual wickedness in high places."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"6"|"013"|"Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God
column2: that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day
column3: and having done all
column4: to stand."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"6"|"014"|"Stand therefore
column2: having your loins girt about with truth
column3: and having on the breastplate of righteousness
column4: Ephesians"|"49"|"6"|"015"|"And your feet shod with the preparation of the gospel of peace
column5: Ephesians"|"49"|"6"|"016"|"Above all
column6: taking the shield of faith
column7: wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"6"|"017"|"And take the helmet of salvation
column2: and the sword of the Spirit
column3: which is the word of God:"

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"6"|"018"|"Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit
column2: and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints
column3: Ephesians"|"49"|"6"|"019"|"And for me
column4: that utterance may be given unto me
column5: that I may open my mouth boldly
column6: to make known the mystery of the gospel
column7: Ephesians"|"49"|"6"|"020"|"For which I am an ambassador in bonds: that therein I may speak boldly

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"6"|"021"|"But that ye also may know my affairs
column2: and how I do
column3: Tychicus
column4: a beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord
column5: shall make known to you all things:"

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"6"|"022"|"Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose
column2: that ye might know our affairs
column3: and that he might comfort your hearts."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"6"|"023"|"Peace be to the brethren
column2: and love with faith
column3: from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ."

column1: "Ephesians"|"49"|"6"|"024"|"Grace be with all them that love our Lord Jesus Christ in sincerity. Amen."
